title: New: Tallows – Flat Bones
content:
Oklahoma’s Tallows show yet again why they’re one of this years most exciting new artists on Flat Bones, another cut taken from their debut LP which is out in a few days time.

Comparisons to Death Cab To Cutie and Vampire Weekend may well be the first that spring to mind, yet there’s a lot more to their sound than simply being good copycats. Check out Flat Bones below, and check back for their debut album, Memory Marrow which is out 31 August.

‘dreamers took my dreams / i’m wide awake / my pillow screams’
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
